career.name: University of Waterloo Formula Electric
career.title: Software Engineer - Dashboard Lead
description: Led the development of a new driver dashboard, improving readability and simplifying car debugging for the team
Designed and implemented CAN connectivity for real-time telemetry, allowing critical data transfer between the car and dashboard
Enhanced the dashboardâ€™s usability, increasing data readability and performance, and installed the program onto a standalone Beaglebone Black running Debian Linux
Developed cloud-based telemetry dashboards for real-time analysis using AWS services including API Gateway and Lambda
Collaborated in Agile sprints to rapidly iterate on designs, receiving and implementing team feedback to ensure alignment with driver requirements and team goals
